content: SANTIAGO  Oct 13 Enersis Americas SA  a Latin American unit of Italian energy company Enel SpA   has sent a prospectus for a potential bond issuance to the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission  a person familiar with the process said late on Wednesday.
name: Enel Americas SA
title: Enersis Americas prepares U.S. bond issuance - source

name: Enel Americas SA
title: Enel subsidiary Enersis Americas approves merger of South American assets
